title: Vue and Nuxt
description: Bay Clock 3 is built upon VueJS, a progressive javascript framework that builds on basic HTML, JS, and CSS to add reactivity and a more powerful developer experience. Nuxt, in turn, is a VueJS framework that streamlines development, SEO, and deployment

children.value: Bay Clock 3 is built upon VueJS, a progressive javascript framework that builds on basic HTML, JS, and CSS to add reactivity and a more powerful developer experience. Nuxt, in turn, is a VueJS framework that streamlines development, SEO, and deployment
An understanding of HTML, javascript, and JSON is required. I will try to explain each component, page, and function pretty in-depth. However, I reccomend learning the basics of both
